thread.title: Toshiba Names Outsiders to New Board
thread.title_full: Toshiba Names Outsiders to New Board - WSJ

author: Takashi Mochizuki
title: Toshiba Names Outsiders to New Board
text:
TOKYO—Toshiba Corp. named a new board Tuesday with outsiders taking a majority, as the electronics company struggles to overcome an accounting scandal that led its president to resign last month.
Toshiba said its newly constituted 11-member board would include seven outsiders, all of them Japanese. The proportion of outsiders is unusual among Japanese companies. Toshiba’s earlier lineup, in which 12 of the 16 directors were company...
